experiment.description: 基线实验 Hydra-Zen配置版 knowledge_num=1M epochs=10
experiment.command: accelerate launch 1_pretrain.py --out_dir /home/pci/ExplicitLM/outputs/2025-11-02/14-20-34_cluster training.epochs=1 model.knowledge_num=1024 model.dim=64 model.n_layers=2 training.batch_size=1 training.learning_rate=2e-4 logging.use_swanlab=True

checkpoint_info.note: 整个outputs目录已被DVC管理，跳过单独追踪

data_checkout_steps: git checkout 28065662dcc2fbccfb47ada4147452adeb00d905 && dvc checkout data/database.dvc && git checkout -
git checkout cd7f9bb784c5dbfabf8193cbca40d66d99e3ba09 && dvc checkout data/benchmarks.dvc && git checkout -
reproduction.checkpoint_pull: dvc pull outputs (整个outputs目录包含checkpoint)
reproduction.full_command:
# 1. 恢复代码版本
git checkout 18205b174b93f16e7b8ee8f1b87fa52312cd3482

# 2. 恢复各数据集版本
git checkout 28065662dcc2fbccfb47ada4147452adeb00d905 && dvc checkout data/database.dvc && git checkout -
git checkout cd7f9bb784c5dbfabf8193cbca40d66d99e3ba09 && dvc checkout data/benchmarks.dvc && git checkout -

# 3. 拉取输出目录
dvc pull outputs

# 4. 运行训练
accelerate launch 1_pretrain.py --out_dir /home/pci/ExplicitLM/outputs/2025-11-02/14-20-34_cluster training.epochs=1 model.knowledge_num=1024 model.dim=64 model.n_layers=2 training.batch_size=1 training.learning_rate=2e-4 logging.use_swanlab=True
